#summary User profile-based data service TOC
#labels Phase-Implementation,userdata

== Introduction ==

The UserData classes contain all the tools needed to retrieve [http://www.audioscrobbler.net/data/webservices/#User%20Profile%20Data all the available data for a specific users profile] on Last.fm.

== Available User Profile Data ==

 * [UserDataProfile Profile Information]
 * [UserDataTopArtists Top Artists]
 * [UserDataTopAlbums Top Albums]
 * [UserDataTopTracks Top Tracks]
 * [UserDataTopTags Top Tags]
 * [UserDataTopArtistTags Top Tags for Artist]
 * [UserDataTopAlbumTags Top Tags for Album]
 * [UserDataTopTrackTags Top Tags for Track]
 * [UserDataFriends Friends List]
 * [UserDataNeighbours Neighbours]
 * [UserDataRecentTracks Recent Tracks]
 * [UserDataRecentBannedTracks Recent Banned Tracks]
 * [UserDataRecentLovedTracks Recent Loved Tracks]
 * [UserDataRecentJournals Recent Journals]
 * [UserDataWeeklyChartList Weekly Chart List]
 * [UserDataWeeklyArtistsChart Weekly Artists Chart]
 * [UserDataWeeklyAlbumsChart Weekly Albums Chart]
 * [UserDataWeeklyTracksChart Weekly Tracks Chart]
 * [UserDataManualRecommendations Manual Recommendations]
 * [UserDataSystemRecommendations System Recommendations]
 * [UserDataUserEvents User Events / Friends' Events / System Event Recommendations]
 * [UserDataTasteOMeter Taste-O-Meter]
